welcome.title: Welcome to Velocity Offroad
description: Velocity Offroad is a fictional racing team created as part of a portfolio project to demonstrate full-stack web development, UI/UX design, and content integration skills. It represents an engineering club that designs and builds ATV-style off-road vehicles for competitive events.
The project showcases frontend and backend development, structured content, and component-based architecture â€“ mimicking a real-world motorsports team experience for learning purposes.

mission.title: Project Goals
mission.statement: This project aims to simulate a professional team website that could be used by an ATV racing club. It was built to demonstrate practical knowledge in web technologies, content modeling, and user-focused design while highlighting core values like innovation, teamwork, and technical excellence.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Showcasing creative UI ideas and a technically sound development process.

values.title: Teamwork
values.description: Demonstrating how collaborative content and project structure can be implemented in solo or group projects.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Emphasizing high standards in coding, design, and project presentation.
